# Kube Tools  

An extension to Kustomize cli. Adds more transformers and generators for use. 

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
:caption: Modules
:glob:

modules/*
```

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
:caption: Transformers
:glob:

transformers/*
```

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
:caption: Generators
:glob:

generators/*
```

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
:caption: Tutorials
:glob:

tutorials/*
```
